results.title: Simvastatin inhibits smoke-induced airway epithelial injury: implications for COPD therapy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibits smoke-induced airway @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Glandular_and_Epithelial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009375 @@@epithelial injury@@@: implications for @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Davis BB, Zeki AA, Bratt JM, Wang L, Filosto S, Walby WF, Kenyon NJ, Goldkorn T, Schelegle ES, Pinkerton KE. Simvastatin inhibits smoke-induced airway epithelial injury: implications for COPD therapy. Eur Respir J. 2013 Aug;42(2):350-61. PMID: 23180589

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates intestinal fibrosis independent of the anti-inflammatory effect by promoting fibroblast/myofibroblast apoptosis in the regeneration/healing process from TNBS-induced colitis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: (1) The clinical findings showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIMV@@@ showed anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects with body @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Glandular_and_Epithelial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009375 @@@epithelial injury@@@ in the late phase.

citations.NLM: Abe Y, Murano M, Murano N, Morita E, Inoue T, Kawakami K, Ishida K, Kuramoto T, Kakimoto K, Okada T, Narabayashi K, Umegaki E, Higuchi K. Simvastatin attenuates intestinal fibrosis independent of the anti-inflammatory effect by promoting fibroblast/myofibroblast apoptosis in the regeneration/healing process from TNBS-induced colitis. Dig Dis Sci. 2012 Feb;57(2):335-44. PMID: 21909991
